titleStmt.title: The picture of the Councel of State, held forth to the free people of England by Lievt. Col. John Lilburn, Mr Thomas Prince, and Mr Richard Overton, now prisoners in the Tower of London. Or, a full narrative of the late extra-judicial and military proceedings against them. Together with the substance of their several examinations, answers and deportments before them at Darby house, upon the 28. of March last.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
Prince, Thomas.
Overton, Richard, fl. 1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
